title: Brad Pitt filmography
summary: Brad Pitt is an American actor and producer. His acting career began in 1987 with roles in the hit Fox television series 21 Jump Street. He subsequently appeared in episodes for television shows during the late 1980s and played his first major role in the slasher film Cutting Class (1989).[1] He gained recognition in Thelma & Louise (1991) and A River Runs Through It (1992).[2][3] He later took on the role of vampire Louis de Pointe du Lac in the horror drama Interview with the Vampire (1994) and for his performance in the epic drama Legends of the Fall (1994), he earned his first Golden Globe Award for Best Actor nomination.[4]
